Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the underground garage near the residential area consisting of gray buildings in front of you for access. Thinking back on past actions and objects you saw, what should you approach next in order to get from your current location to your destination?  
choose:  
A. I approach the top of the tallest crane on the construction site.  
B. I approach the underground garage.  
C. I approach the street light closest to the building entrance.  
D. I approach the crosswalk in front of the store.  
E. I approach the residential area entrance.
